Description: Epoch LP Style Electric Guitar Black Professionally Set Up! You are viewing a used Epoch Les Paul copy by Gibson in a black finish. This guitar features a rosewood fretboard, stock tailpiece bridge combo, deluxe tuners, and two humbuckers.  This guitar has been professionally set up in store to sound, play, and look great! Guitar is used and has a few slight blemishes and imperfections, see pictures for best view of cosmetic condition.  The instrument pictured is the one you will receive. We use our own photos to ensure that you have a full view of the exact instrument you are purchasing. A case or a bag is available for an additional fee. Please contact us if you’re interested. PERRY'S PROFESSIONAL SETUP:This guitar has been professionally setup to play great!Guitars do not generally come from the factory setup, so this is a huge benefit for all players from beginning to professional, and in our opinion a must have! No professional player would use a guitar that hasn't been setup, nor should you!We normally charge $75 for this service, but for you this is a FREE BONUS included with every guitar we sell online!This includes truss rod adjustment, fret dressing, nut and saddle adjustment, and much more.**CLICK HERE FOR VIDEO** Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
